title: Joe's Bar (1987)
description:
And my nomination for the single worst comic book cover of all time goes tooooo.... this one. The book is fine enough, weird little story with interesting art (faces are warped and misshapen, almost like caricatures), but the cover is just awful! lol It's probably just me and most people will think it's fine... me, not so much.

-------------------------------------------------------- 


Joe's Bar

Titan Books, 1987, 94 pages

Written by Carlos Sampayo

Joe's Bar is a waystation on the boulevard of broken dreams, a dark harbor for slowly sinking ships, a lost-and-found center for lost souls trying to find themselves in a violent world
